item.title: Tesla Sales Plunge in Germany, Reflecting Broader Slump in Europe
item.description: February numbers show the U.S. electric-car maker is struggling to attract buyers in the region, as anger at Elon Musk’s politics intensifies.

item.title: Adidas Has Sold Its Last Yeezy Sneaker
item.description: The sportswear maker was eager to put the scandal with the rapper Ye behind it, but its cautious earnings forecast showed the breakup’s effects still ...

item.title: Trump Celebrates Disruption in Speech to Congress, and Avoids the Costs
item.description: The president’s speech to Congress covered tariffs, Ukraine and cuts to the federal work force but did little to address the perils that accompany the...

item.title: After Days of Coaching, Zelensky Seeks a Path to Trump’s Good Graces
item.description: Prime Minister Keir Starmer of Britain and President Emmanuel Macron of France have been prodding and counseling Volodymyr Zelensky on how to deal wit...

item.title: C.I.A. Director Says U.S. Has Paused Intelligence Sharing With Ukraine
item.description: Trump administration officials say the halt in assistance is a warning to the Ukrainians of the consequences of not cooperating with the president.
